Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GlobalGoals

Class GlobalGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GlobalGoals.GlobalGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Angles, ColumnsOrRows, EightTiles, GroupOfTiles, Shape, Square, Stair
public abstract class GlobalGoal extends Object implements Cloneable
The GlobalGoal class represents a global goal of the game. Global goals define objectives that players can achieve during the game to increase their score. It implements the Cloneable interface.
